metadata.title: CVE-2024-10394 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A local user can bypass the OpenAFS PAG (Process Authentication Group)throttling mechanism in Unix clients, allowing the user to create a PAGusingan existing id number, effectively joining the PAG and letting the userstealthe credentials in that PAG.

criterions.comment: openafs package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
